column4: cp: cannot stat `./MonoDevelop.desktop': No such file or directory
cp: cannot stat `/MonoDevelop.desktop': No such file or directory
why are you putting ./ infront of the file?
if your're in the same directory as the file just type the filename no need for ./ or /
cp: cannot stat `MonoDevelop.desktop': No such file or directory
.desktop is a file do not use -r. are you sure that file is in that directory?
thank you i misstaked file name
you can use tab to auto complete the filename.. for example Mono*tab tab  .. it should complete it IF the file is in the same working directory
